00022 
00023 class DataItem;
00024 class FilterRule;
00025 
00028 /*
00029 NOTE: No writing is possible on a FindProvider. Use <em>GetChildRow</em> to get
00030 the row of the child provider and update the child provider directly.
00031 See also: <em>Provider, FilterProvider, Find2Provider, DataItem, FilterRule</em>.*/
00032 class FindProvider : public AbstractDelegationProvider
00033 {
00034     public:
00035         typedef AbstractDelegationProvider Base;
00037         FindProvider();
00038 
00043         FindProvider(Provider * provider, FilterRule * rule, INT columnid = 0);
00045         virtual ~FindProvider();
00046 
00048         void Init(Provider * provider, FilterRule * rule, INT columnid = 0);
00049 
00051         virtual INT RowCount();
00052 
00054         virtual BOOLEAN GetChildRow(INT & childrow, INT row);
00055 
00057         virtual BOOLEAN GetDataItem(INT column, INT row, DataItem & item);
00058 
00061         virtual BOOLEAN DeleteAllRows(ProviderListener * listener = 0);
00062 
00064         virtual BOOLEAN Update(ProviderListener * listener = 0);
00065 
00068         virtual void OnExecutingListener(Provider* provider = 0);
00069 
00070     protected:
00071         virtual void OnChildProviderModification(Provider* provider, const Provider::Modification& modification);
00072 
00073         INT          m_FindRow;
00074         INT          m_column;
00075         FilterRule * m_rule;
00076 };
